sn22.18:1.3: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo rupassa uppadaya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.4: Aniccasambhutam, bhikkhave, rupam kuto niccam bhavissati.
sn22.18:1.6: Yopi hetu, yopi paccayo vedanaya uppadaya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.7: Aniccasambhuta, bhikkhave, vedana kuto nicca bhavissati.
sn22.18:1.10: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo sankharanam uppadaya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.11: Aniccasambhuta, bhikkhave, sankhara kuto nicca bhavissanti.
sn22.18:1.13: Yopi hetu yopi paccayo vinnanassa uppadaya, sopi anicco.
sn22.18:1.14: Aniccasambhutam, bhikkhave, vinnanam kuto niccam bhavissati.
